City Council
============

Regular Meetings
----------------

* 6 p.m.
* 2nd Tuesday of each month
* City Hall

215 S Ash Street

Pearsall, TX 78061

Agendas & Minutes
-----------------

Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval.   
  
[View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes](https://cityofpearsall.org/government/agendas_minutes.php)

Vision & Goals
--------------

The City of Pearsall aims for the City of Pearsall to be a clean, safe, vibrant and inclusive community which provides residents and businesses a high quality of life and that all are proud to call “home”.  
  
Pearsall is a welcoming community which maintains traditional values and develops human relationships while embracing unity, trust, integrity, and transparency.  
  
Learn more about [the Council's vision and goals](https://cityofpearsall.org/Documents/Government/City%20Council/2018-2019%20COP%20Council%20Vision%20and%20Goals.pdf) .  
  

Contact
-------

To send correspondence, please use the following address:  
  
**City Hall**  
C / O [please address to individual council member]  
215 S Ash Street  
Pearsall, TX 78061  
  
To leave a message via phone, call 830-334-4160.
